extendedInfo.description: Are you a highly motivated SrA - MSgt?  Have you ever wanted to have the opportunity to mold tomorrow's Air Force while broadening your Air Force career?  This application provides all the information you ever needed to know about becoming an Air Force Military Training Instructor (MTI).  As an MTI you will gain intangible leadership skills, superior training techniques, and a four-year controlled tour changing the lives of our future Airmen.

reviews.title: SD CARD!!
reviews.comment: Works great with my LG phone! Love that I can move this to my SD card, and I can learn all about MTI duty without opinions, just facts! No crashes,freezes etc. Perfect APP!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: MTI Duty...do it!
reviews.comment: I am currently a MTI but wanted to check this out. Good info offered and very accurate as of now. Hopefully it will attract the RIGHT type of applicants. I encourage anyone who wants this job for all the right reasons and not just to yell at and bully trainees, apply now! It\'s a blast!! Can\'t top it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mti learning
reviews.comment: Get this if you want to know the basis of being an mti
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app, needs a little updating
reviews.comment: They no longer take SrA or Ssgt as MTIs. New regulations only take Tsgt and above.
reviews.author: Ariel Phillips
